sentences.en: a major road
sentences.cn: 干道

sentences.en: He conjectured that some individuals may be able to detect major calamities.
sentences.cn: 他猜测说有些人也许能够察觉重大灾难。

sentences.en: He said the issue was not a major irritant.
sentences.cn: 他说那个问题不是什么大问题。

sentences.en: He saw the Major's face a few inches from his own.
sentences.cn: 他看见少校的脸离他自己的只有几英寸.

sentences.en: He underwent major heart surgery recently.
sentences.cn: 他最近做了心脏大手术。

sentences.en: He’s majoring in Political Science.
sentences.cn: 他主修政治学。

sentences.en: Her major is history.
sentences.cn: 她的主修科目是历史。

sentences.en: His pitching was a legend among major league hitters.
sentences.cn: 他的投球在大联盟的击球员中是个传奇。

sentences.en: It could have sparked a major confrontation.
sentences.cn: 此事险些导致一场严重的冲突。

sentences.en: Jackson had been a major power-broker in the 1988 Presidential elections.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊是1988年总统选举中举足轻重的权力经纪人。

sentences.en: John Major has reached the pinnacle of British politics.
sentences.cn: 约翰·梅杰已攀上了英国政界的顶峰。

sentences.en: Major questions remain to be answered about his work.
sentences.cn: 关于他工作的许多重要问题仍然悬而未决。

sentences.en: Now his other major works are creeping back into concert programmes.
sentences.cn: 现在他的其他主要作品又悄然出现在音乐会节目单上。

sentences.en: Olga Korbut single-handedly turned gymnastics into a major event.
sentences.cn: 奥尔佳·科布特独自一人将体操变成了一项重要赛事。

sentences.en: Once in a while we had a major blowout.
sentences.cn: 我们偶尔会吃顿大餐。

sentences.en: Smoking is one of the major causes of cancer.
sentences.cn: 吸烟是引发癌症的元凶之一。

sentences.en: Spain has been one of Cuba's major trading partners.
sentences.cn: 西班牙一直是古巴的主要贸易伙伴之一。

sentences.en: The government’s major concern is with preventing road accidents.
sentences.cn: 政府关注的大事是预防道路交通事故。

sentences.en: The King made major concessions to end the confrontation with his people.
sentences.cn: 为了结束与其臣民的冲突，国王作出了很大的让步。

sentences.en: The loss of their goalkeeper through injury was a major setback for the team.
sentences.cn: 守门员因伤缺阵使该队的实力大打折扣。

sentences.en: the major developments in computer technology
sentences.cn: 计算机技术的重大进步

sentences.en: There are two major political parties in the US.
sentences.cn: 美国有两大政党。

sentences.en: There is a major problem with parking in London.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦，停车是个很大的问题。

sentences.en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentences.cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentences.en: Van Gogh had a major influence on the development of modern painting.
sentences.cn: 凡·高对现代绘画的发展有着重大影响。

sentences.en: Wanting fidelity implies you're thinking about a major relationship.
sentences.cn: 要求忠诚意味着你想发展一段严肃认真的恋爱关系。

sentences.en: What are your major subject and minor subject?
sentences.cn: 你的主修科目和辅修科目是什么?。

sentences.en: Why do you like your major?
sentences.cn: 你为什么喜欢你的主修科目?。

words.tran_cn: [人类]成年人；主修科目；陆军少校

phrases.tran_cn: 职业体协；职业性运动联盟

trans.tran_cn: 重要的，严重的，大音阶的，主修的
trans.tran_en: having very serious or worrying results

trans.tran_cn: 少校，主修课程，主修…的学生，大型企业，大联盟
trans.tran_en: an officer of middle rank in the British or US army or  marine s  ,or in the US air force
to study something as your main subject at college or university
